sources.title: Montana | Full Action Crime Movie | Lars Mikkelsen
sources.description:
A high-octane tale of betrayal and redemption, centered on an unlikely bond between a 14 year old boy and a former Serbian commando.
2014.  Stars: Lars Mikkelsen, Ashley Walters, McKell David

metadata.Plot: Claire is a tough gang member that has to find the Boss' mistress, Kitty, who ran away from him. She is accompanied by Boss' trigger-happy son Jimmy. Claire's colleague gangster Nick is terminally ill and cancer starts to take over him.
metadata.Actors: Kyra Sedgwick, Stanley Tucci, Robin Tunney
